level.heading: Alterations to multiple dwelling and conversions to multiple dwellings.
level.text: ยง 27-120 Alterations to multiple dwelling and conversions to multiple dwellings. At the option of the owner, regardless of the cost of the alteration or conversion, an alteration may be made to a multiple dwelling or a building may be converted to a multiple dwelling in accordance with all requirements of this code or in accordance with all applicable laws in existence prior to December sixth, nineteen hundred sixty-eight, provided the general safety and public welfare are not thereby endangered.
